name: Leo
text: On Play: You may rest one of your leader or stage: If your leader is Usopp, look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Reveal up to 2 cards other than [Leo] that have the (Dressrosa) type, and put them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck and trash 1 card from your hand.
